Sonic was about to head into the gym, but then thought about all the hard work he performed in last few months. He had cracked Eggman so many times he couldn't make an omlete out of all the yolks. He figured he could just relax and have a good meal for once.
As he entered the restaurant he was greeted by a waitress. "Congradulations! You are our 1,000th customer! You get a free meal today."
Not wanting to pass up such an opportunity he ordered up several different things off the menu from corn dogs to pizza to ice cream and cake for dessert. It took him nearly two hours to eat it all. He had to occassionally walk off some of the food, but inevitably it all went into his stomach. He patted his bloated stomach.
"I've never eaten so much before. I've never felt so bloated either. I doubt I'll be able to eat for a while."
He took his leave, but not before the waitress gave him a few coupons to the retaurant if he would ever come back. Sonic decided he might come back here more often and even invite his friends if they'd like to come.

11121.content:
A month later, Sonic was sitting in the restaurant, eating like he had been every night since the free meal. But he had slowly been changing as he ate more and more every day.

Sonic was fatter; his belly had gone from just round to downright doughy, hanging over his legs and bulging out even when he was hungry. His arms were wider too, jiggling as his arms moved food from his plate to his mouth. His butt was larger too, and the size of his legs made his feet look even smaller.

As he continued to eat more and more, the size and type of his portions had changed; he had gone from small fries to medium onion rings to large grease crisps, and his burgers grew in size as well.

Sonic heaved himself up from the table, having finished his 30th consecutive meal at the restaurant. "Thanks for the food!" he told the cashier, and he waddled out the door.

When he was outside, he realized that it had been quite a while since he had last seen his friends. He wondered what they might have been up to while he was pigging away at all these meals.

"Hmm..." thought the hedgehog, "who should I see next?"

Tails opens the door to see a delivery guy holding an electronic pamphlet, standing at the doorstep with a big delivery truck behind him parked on the side of the road. "Hello sir, this the Prawyr residence, am I correct?" the man asked, lifting the electronic pamphlet and handing it to Tails. "I'll need you to sign here."

Tails was confused, he was sure he hadn't ordered anything, but it was to the Prower residence (even though Sonic was the man of the house) so he was sure it was the right place, so he signed his name. The delivery guy took back the pamphlet afterwards and says "Thank you, sir." He then turns around and yells in the direction of the truck, "Okay guys, load em out!"

To Tails' surprise, two other delivery guys rolled out a huge crate and set it in front of Tails with a thump. The delivery guy says "Have a nice day." and the three guys all go back to the truck and drive off in it.

Apparently there was a mistake somewhere in delivery due to Prawyr and Prower being pronounced the same. Tails considered seeing who the crate was from and where it was suppoesd to go to, but a crate this big must cost a lot to ship and they'd probably be better off forgetting about it. 1211122112.content:
Tails was hoping it'd be chips or donuts or ice cream or something, but hey, boxes of drink mix are better than nothing...

Tails went off to his workshop and jumped in a little mecha of his and carried the huge back back to a back room of the workshop. He then suddenly remembered he had those waffles in the microwave, and took a box of the drink mix with him as he rushed to the kitchen.

He looked at the box, and the drink mix was chocolate mint flavor. Tails' face lit up in glee as he got a big glass to make the mix in.

However, Tails didn't look at the finer print on the box, that said "Drink mix intended for underweight individuals struggling with appetite and/or calorie absorption. Do not consume more than a packet a day for your own safety." The calorie information also listed 1000 calories per packet, which was unbelievably high for a simple drink mix. Tails only glanced at the ingredient list to make sure it didn't have MSG or aspartame in it, and proceeded to rip open the box.

The packets were tiny, half the size of a normal packet of hot cocoa mix, and since Tails always put 2 packets of mix in a cup, he proceeded to rip open 6 packets (there were around 30 in a box) and poured them into his huge glass of milk. He stirred them around briskly with a stirring machine, and got his waffles out of the microwave. Tails slathered syrup on his pancakes and dug in, taking big glugs from his chocolate mint milk.

After Tails had finished his big stack of waffles and drank two big glasses of chocolate milk, he layed back in his seat and basked in the glow from being so stuffed. It had been some time before Tails had ever stuffed himself this much - he must've been pretty starved. His stomach was big and bulged underneath him as he rubbed it and got up from his seat to go off to the workshop to work on a project of his.

But then all of a sudden as Tails was under a machine of his fixing it, Tails felt hungry again, like he hadn't eaten anything. He knew he couldn't work on his machinery if he was hungry, so he had to get something to eat.

It was around the afternoon, so tails thought to himself a nice hamburger and fries would hit the spot. Punching in a couple of buttons that was on the table and he made a Doughnut Hamburger with cheese and 6 strips of bacon into it. Looking at the food being made in front of him made a drool a bit, until he realized he forgotten the fries. "Hmm... Waffle fries or French Fries? I guess Waffle fries would be lot better. Better make sure they are bigger size than normal. I'm starving over here" Tails said to himself. Adding his fires to the menu, he looked up at the TV and notice that Sonic was defeating eggman's robots again. "You think by now he could just avoid those things. Honestly Sonic, why would you..." Tails said until a ding noise came from the table. Tails looked down in front of him and saw on what he ordered.

The smell and look of the food made Tail's stomach groan more than ever. He picked up the burger and took a bite outta it. The 5 pound burger tasted, so sweet and delicious that tails began eating faster. Tails made it in a couple bites into the burger, until he decided eat the fries with it. He was about to eat the fries, until he notice that it didn't have any toppings on it. "Oh dang it. I forgot to add salt and pepper to this." Grabbing the salt and pepper shakers, he covered the fires, until he thought he had put enough on top of it. Grabbing a large waffle fry, bit down into one and instantly fell in love with the taste of it. He began eating all the fries that he recently covered in salt and pepper. As he kept eating, his belly and waist started to expand little by little. "Oh my god, this food is so good! I have to remember to order this again." Tails said. He had just finished eating all of the fries and looked over to the burger that he still had.

Licking his lips, he reached out, grabbed the burger, and began eating it again. His body fatten up by eat bite, he eats his way through the middle. His entire head was surrounded by the burger, but tails thought he could eat his way out of it. Lifting his head out, he began to eat the side of the doughnut burger, working his way to the end. His belly began bulge out halfway down his thigh. Taking another few bites, he realized he was almost done with his food. He shoved the rest of the burger into his mouth and swallow it whole. A bulge of the food ran down his throat and down to his fatten belly. Licking his lips and face that still had the doughnut sugar glaze around his mouth, he gave a content sigh and letting out a thunderous belch.

"Whoa, that was just a perfect meal," Tails said. After done eating, he thought he could use something to drink. He quickly punch a couple of buttons and a extra-large soda popped out of the table and straight into Tails' hands. Cream began to rub Tails belly, which made Tails open his mouth and flop is tongue out. "You loving this don't you?" Cream said. I know he is my best friend and all, but this guy is a little too.... Wait a minute. I feel pressure on my stomach," Tails said to himself. Being the only one in the universe to protect the Master Emerald is a tough job. You have to be constantly alert and on your toes, even though most of the time you're just sitting there watching grass grow. No one would willingly choose the job, but life drops things on you.

And to make it worse, the little red echidna who holds this responsibility also has to deal with a crazed egg-obsessed scientist who's trying to take over the world every other minute. Having to work together with Sonic and the gang surely doesn't help your stress issues, either, as Knuckles is experiencing right about now...
- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -


Knuckles, sweating and breathing heavily, lugged a large sack of fruit under each arm as he wearily stepped out of a thick rain forested area. "Whew, at least today was a good haul, now to eat the stuff..."

Knuckles harvests a large amount of fruit in that forest. To him, there's nothing more exciting than the thrill of having a workout on a mountain, going into the forest hungry, picking the ripe fruit and chowing down on it after he's worked up a sweat. Naturally these habits don't leave him with a lot of weight left, so he's not really much more than skin, bones and muscle at the moment.

He sat down with his sacks on a big rock outside of the forest, the Master Emerald in clear view. He picked out a cluster of grapes, picked a couple off and tossed them above his head, ready to catch them in his open mouth.

Sadly, they never made it to his mouth. After a few seconds of confusion, Knuckles opened his eyes to see Sonic lounging on a branch above him, munching the grapes with an "I don't care" look on his face. "Oh hey there, Nuckster!" Sonic announced as if he were surprised to see Knuckles below him.

Knuckles grunt-sighed. "What are you doing here? You said you were looking out for Eggman again back in the city."

Sonic smirked and closed his eyes as he lied on the branch with his arms behind his head. "Hey, can I help it if Eggman's more boring than a block of wood? I thought I'd drop in to say hi. You should feel thankful for that."

Knuckles looked unimpressed. He then noticed a small pile of sacks in the corner of his vision. Sonic answered, "Oh, I decided to help you harvest your fruit, you left so many fruit behind it just bugged me, so I made your job quicker for you. Oh, and they all taste bitter, but I'm sure you're used to health food more than I am..."

Knuckles, surprised and perplexed, took a fighting annoyed stance towards Sonic and yelled, "You're supposed to let them get ripe first! You can't just go and pi-"

Sonic interrupted. "Hey, if nature can't keep up to speed with my eating, then I can't keep up to speed with waiting for it. Wait, I mean up to waiting with, I mean putting up with- whatever." Sonic jumped off the limb and grabbed Knuckles' two sacks fruit. I'll just take my share of the work here, pal. So yeah, sayonara!"

Sonic gestured his hand to his head in a peace sign at the last sentence, right before dashing off to who knows where. Knuckles had gotten up and was going to whack him one but he was so exhausted after working himself all day that he just didn't feel like it. Sure, there was fish, but this was a short season on fish and Knuckles had depended on having some ripe fruit to eat.

Knuckles collapsed onto the ground in sweat and hopelessness. "I can't let myself get this exhausted again, I've got to do something about this..."


What will Knuckles decide to do?

Knuckles was hard at work working out. The effort wasn't so much actually lifting the weights, but finding weights that were actually an effort to lift. See, Knuckles already was used to doing a lot of lifting and heavy work in the mountains with boulders, doing lots of odd jobs involving heavy lifting, things like that. So Knuckles was only able to feel a sense of working out by lifting a thousand pounds or more by getting other lifters to sit on the ends of the barbell, and then only if he pumped it for 10 minutes or so. Sonic characters are already freaks of nature, so this wasn't that surprising.

Finally, Knuckles got slightly worked out (but mostly bored) after about half an hour, when he set his barbell down on the ground. All of a sudden he smelled a barrage of delicious food smells coming from a doorway behind him, along with the sound of a dinner bell being rung. He could recognize the smells of steak, cinnamon buns, mashed potatoes, cheeseburgers... His mouth started to drool, and one of the other weightlifters put his hand on Knuckles' shoulder and said, "You gotta eat good between your workouts, or else yain't gonna be bulkin' up none, y'hear?"

Knuckles nodded and wiped the drool from his mouth with his fist. He followed the weight lifters, who were making a line to the cafeteria serving table. He was surprised and delighted to see that the serving trays were huge, and the servers were very generous with their portions. Today's menu was steak, mashed potatoes and gravy, but you could go back up and get seconds any time you wanted, and there was a huge variety of foods to eat. Everything he smelled, and so much more, was there and it drove him crazy at the thought. But then he shook his head and said to himself, "Nope, gotta keep it small, I didn't work out that much today, just eat the steak and potatoes and go back lifting..."

Knuckles finally progressed in the line to the servers, he showed his card, and they loaded his tray with steak and mashed 'taters. He picked up his silverware and dug in.

He had expected that the food would be lousy, seeing as they were serving so many people and they would have to cut corners wherever possible. But Knuckles was surprised to find out that this was the best steak and potatoes he had ever tasted! After what felt like only a few bites, his tray was empty, and his stomach still felt empty.

He would obviously have to go back for seconds, so he went back to the food tables, where the smells and sights of more steak and potatoes, fruity protein shakes, cinnamon rolls, cheeseburgers, and donuts flooded his senses.

"Well... just a little wouldn't hurt..."
1342.title: Unlimited food bar access? Count me in!

13421.content:
Knuckles was unable to resist trying everything the cafeteria had to offer. He stuffed himself on everything from meatball subs to boxes of donuts to high-calorie fruity protein shakes, and everything in between. He had taken a couple breaks during the day to do a half hour or so of weight lifting before he got hungry again and stuffed himself again, before taking another break then another stuffing and so on.

Knuckles, with his stomach poking almost 6 inches from his body, slowly pushed in one last donut into his mouth. He now was so full that he had to lay down on the cafeteria chairs, which were all deserted by now. Knuckles had never felt so stuffed in his life, and he rubbed his bloated tummy in ecstasy as he licked his lips and quietly moaned a little in pleasure.

The lights were turned off, and Knuckles lifted his head enough to look around to see what was happening.

"Oh, I thought everyone was out of here already, sorry." The janitor turned back on the lights. "The place is closing for the night, you need to go home, okay? ...glad you enjoyed the food."

Knuckles felt annoyed that they would interrupt him like this, then suddenly realized that he had done almost nothing but stuff himself the whole day. Knuckles struggled out of his seat, and slowly but surely managed to get on his feet again. He stuck a few donuts in his dreads and carried a few as he left the room, and the janitor turned off the lights as they left.
- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -

As Knuckles got back to his place, munching on his donuts on the way, he came across a stream, shining with the moonlight. Knuckles looked in it and was shocked to see his figure: his stomach was huge, round, and jiggled a little with every movement.

Knuckles consoled himself with what that one weight lifter told him about eating when you work out, and convinced himself that it would eventually turn to muscle, and that he could work it off if it didn't.
13421.title: Later...

choices: Work to lose the weight in the morning.
134211.content:
Throughout the week, Knuckles had forgotten about actually lifting weights and just stayed in the food bar all day.

"It'll turn to muscle eventually, and if it doesn't I'll just work it off," Knuckles thought to himself every day as he got into bigger and bigger binges.

That night as Knuckles passed by that stream again, he saw his reflection in the glistening water. His stomach was bigger than ever, his arms were slightly thicker, and his cheeks were bigger. Knuckles also saw that there was a spot of donut frosting just below his neckline, so he got that off and licked his glove.

He realized that this wasn't really working that well.
134211.title: One week later...

choices: "I don't have to be bigger than Sonic in muscle, I'm already bigger in fat!"
"I can just go to the Master Emerald and get it to make my muscles bigger!"

"I'm imagining things, I'm bound to get huge from all this food eventually!" said Knuckles, and he continued to go to the food bar every day, from opening to closing.

His belly began to get more and more capacity as he was able to eat longer without stopping. He even set goals for himself on how many calories he could eat in one day.

However, instead of turning into muscle like he had hoped, Knuckles just got fatter and fatter...

It hit Knuckles one day when he was walking home again, but this time he couldn't even see his reflection due to the massive size of his belly.

"Huh, that's strange..." he said, and he waddled over to a nearby shop window instead. What he saw came as a shock; his belly was massive, a huge orb of flesh several feet in diameter, and his butt was even bigger. His arms were supporting wide sacks of fat that hug and jiggled as he moved them, and his legs were the size of tree trunks.

Knuckles grew worried. His technique wasn't working. Now how was he going to get bigger than Sonic?

"Wait," he said. "That's it!"

What's it?

it worked! knuckles could see and feel his muscles growing rapidly!

knuckles runs as fast as he can to the master emeralds shrine. it took a long time to reach the top.

knuckles placed his flabby arms on the emerald and closed his eyes.

“master emerald. i need your help. i have been careless and my body is not fit for a guardian. i havent asked anything of you in years so please grant this request. make me the biggest, buffest, strongest, most powerful, most muscular, and mightiest echinda in all of time!”

the master emeralds energy exploded out of it as vast amounts were put in knuckles body he grinned as he felt all his fat melting away. finally the energy sealed itself inside knuckles and the master emerald returned to normal.

13421122.title: using the master emerald to grow

1343.content:
Knuckles didn't feel like getting in debt that quickly, so he said, "Do you sell protein powder or something?"

"Oh yeah, we got tons udduhstuff," the clerk answered as he reached beneath the counter and brought up some canisters of different flavor protein powder. "We got strauwberry, chocklitt, and vanilluh, but I can special order you the other flavuhs."

Knuckles, being the fruitophile he is, says, "I'll take the strawberry. Anything I need to know about this stuff?"

"Yeah, you put this in a shake with other stuff you like, stuff with lots of calories like half and half and ice cream, nowum saiyan? Some peanut butter would be nice too, all stuff with some good protein, yinno?"

Knuckles felt leery of the idea of having to eat such high calorie stuff to bulk up, but hey, what it takes to bulk up, right? "I'll have two."

The clerk pressed buttons on the register until it dinged. "That'll be sebbentenn fiftyfoerh."

Knuckles pulled out a 20 dollar bill out of his dreads and gave it to the clerk. "Keep the change."

The clerk thanked Knuckles, and Knuckles went out the door with his two jugs of protein shake. The clerk suddenly piped up, "Oh right, you'll have to do some reeeal weight liftin' to make those calories stick to your muscles and not to your hips, yin-" But by then Knuckles had already closed the door and left.
- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -

Knuckles went to the supermarket and walked into the ice cream section and stopped. He normally bought fruit sherbet, but he was in for some real pumping up and every morsel had to be as chocked full of calories as it could be.

After putting in a couple tubs of ice cream in his cart, he passed the fruit section. "Nope, gotta get buff," he thought to himself, and went down to the pastry isle, where he got jelly filled donuts. Passed the oatmeal, got chips, passed the vegetables, got cakes on sale.

As he pushed his stuffed cart down to the check out isle, he whipped out his store membership card out of his dreads, a card that gives you more discount per purchase the more you shop at the store. He was going to be taking advantage of this, a lot.
- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -

He ate his food as he watched over the Master Emerald. Sitting in one place doing nothing all day can be insanely boring, so Knuckles had a lot of bored time to use up eating.

He didn't want to use up his protein powder too quickly, so he used mostly ice cream and stuff in his protein shakes. By the end of the day he had finished one tub of ice cream, all but one of the donuts, all of the chips, and was finishing the last of his cake when he saw that his second tub of ice cream had melted, so he chugged that down before finishing his last donut.

Knuckles looked down at his big, full stomach that stuck out about 7 inches from his body. He gave it a rub and fantasized about how buff he would be soon. He layed there in ecstasy as he dozed off in the moonlight.
1343.title: Eh, maybe they just have protein powder or some...

13431.content:
Knuckles, over the week, progressively challenged himself to eat more and more every day, making more protein shakes, emptying more boxes of donuts, devouring more ice cream, munching more chips, eating as much as possible, and loving every second of it, daring himself to reach increasingly large goals of how many calories he consumes per day.

Knuckles' body was wider, his stomach was bigger and rounder from constantly being stuffed, his arms and legs were slightly thicker and his cheeks were bigger and softer and always full of some kind of food. Knuckles loved this. He was walking down the street one day while munching on a jumbo bag of Doritos and suddenly remembered that he was trying to get buff. He found a streetside set of scales and stood on it.

He had gained 30 lbs. He looked down at his belly and gave it a rub, to which it replied with a hungry growl. Apparently he had trained his body into a bigger appetite, because he had just eaten but he was still starving.
13431.title: Over the next week...

"Don't get discouraged, Knuckles... the food just hasn't worked it's magic yet, all you need to do is eat more..."

Knuckles went back to the muscle gym and went up to the front counter again. "Man, have you put on weight?" asked the clerk, chuckling and pointing at Knuckles's new gut.

"Shut up..." said Knuckles. "Do you have any more of that protein powder?"

"Um, not really..." said the clerk. "I mean, we have powder, but we only give this kind to--"

"I'll take it," said Knuckles, putting a $100 on the table. The clerk's eyes widened, and he grabbed it. "Here, take them," said the clerk, and he handed Knuckles seven whole canisters of the stuff.

"Thanks," said Knuckles, and he waddled out the gym.

The clerk just grumbled something about not knowing about the consequences...

Knuckles headed back to Angel Island, where he had already massed a ton of food. Since I have healthier weight gain shake, he thought, I should make larger combinations...

He took one of the large shake canisters and poured 2 cups into the blender, followed by 3 cups of melted ice cream, and topped it off by throwing in a slice of cake. The mixture was very sweet as he poured it down his throat, and it was so delicious that Knuckles decided to make another... and another... and another...
134312.title: Eat faster, Knuckles!

Knuckles was still sitting on Angel Island, but he was much fatter than he had been. His belly hung to his knees, a large sack of dough pouring out of his midsection. His butt was flabby, two giant cheeks of fat, and it hung down as well. His cheeks had inflated, now so big that it seemed like Knuckles had two tennis balls in his mouth. Knuckles also had two chins, and was almost at three. His moobs were huge as well, sagging down his sides.
He was 100 pounds heavier than he was last week.

"Hup..." Knuckles pushed his fat body off the ground and waddled to the pile of food. It was beginning to diminish, so he decided he would get some more.

But Knuckles suddenly caught his reflection in the Master Emerald nearby. He saw his fat body looking back at him, realizing how big he had become.

"Wow... am I really that fat?" he mumbled to himself, looking at his butt in the mirror.

No turning back now! Does Knuckles like his new fat, or does he want to try to get back to normal?

"I'll be okay if I just rest for a bit. A nap could help..." muttered the echidna.

Knuckles looked around for somewhere to rest, and saw a tall tree nearby the Master Emerald's shrine. "That looks like a good place," he noted, and he went over to it.

Knuckles stretched out and reclined under the shade of the tree, yawning a bit. "Now this is heaven..." he said, and he slowly drifted off to sleep.

After a few hours of dreaming, Knuckles was awakened by his cell ringing. He stirred and picked it up, holding it up to his head.

"What?" he said groggily.

"Uh... Knuckles, this is Sonic. I seem to be having a bit of a predicament here... do you think you could come over to Tails's? I need a bit of help..."

Chris sighed as he lounged on the couch. He was alone, and bored out of his mind; Sonic was off running somewhere, Amy and Cream were off shopping, and Tails was helping his grandfather with some new invention. Tanaka and Ella were nowhere to be found. It was a Saturday, so he was still in his pajamas. Eyes half closed, he looked at a nearby clock. It was 11:00 AM. Shrugging, he got up and headed to his room to get dressed.

“Rrrggh! Come on!” Chris grunted as he attempted to button his pants. As of late, there had been a run of relative inactivity from the Chaos Emeralds or Eggman. As a result, Chris had taken to watching more TV, exercising less, and eating more junk food, and his body was beginning to show the effects of it. His waist and stomach were gradually beginning to grow rounder and more pudgy.

Finally, Chris managed to button his jeans. Other than the fact that his stomach could be vaguely seen pressing against his shirt, his clothes still fit. Looking at himself in the mirror, he sighed, placing a hand on his stomach. He suddenly heard it growl, and blushed. “Oh yeah, I didn’t eat breakfast yet?” Chuckling, he made his way to the kitchen and looked around. “Let’s see, what should I do?”

info.brief_description: Want to blimp up one of the characters from Sonic X? Look no further!
info.description:
This is yet another Sonic weight gain story, only this time, it takes place in the Sonic X universe.

Characters can gain in excess of 300 pounds through inflation, food, etc.; basically, any method except vore. No violence or gay material is permitted, either. Aside from that, have fun, go crazy, and happy writing!
